snippet: The European aeronautics giant said it would dissolve a decade-old arrangement that grants the governments of France and Germany an effective veto over strategic management decisions.
abstract: European Aeronautic Defense and Space, parent of Airbus, says it will dissolve a decade-old arrangement that grants the governments of France and Germany an effective veto over strategic management decisions.
lead_paragraph: The European aeronautics giant said it would dissolve a decade-old arrangement that grants the governments of France and Germany an effective veto over strategic management decisions.

headline.main: France and Germany Lose Vetoes Over Airbus Parent
headline.print_headline: France and Germany Lose Vetoes Over Airbus Parent

keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
